assertions.assertion: The pthread_attr_setstackaddr() shall set the thread creation stackaddr attributes in the attr ojbect.
The stack attributes specify the location of storage to be used for the created threads's stack. The size of the storage shall be at lease {PTHREAD_STACK_MIN}.
If success, it returns zero and stores the stackaddr attribute value in stackaddr.
if fail, an error number shall be returned to indicate the error. But No errors are defined. Shall not return an error code of [EINTR]
